Text: Between the strong and stable dividend yield attracting institutional investors and large and accelerating investment flows into alternative property sectors, such as healthcare and self-storage, analysts are forecasting a doubling of the FTSE EPRA Nareit Developed Europe Index to around EUR 500 bn.
Cause: Between the strong and stable dividend yield attracting institutional investors and large and accelerating investment flows into alternative property sectors, such as healthcare and self-storage
Effect: analysts are forecasting a doubling of the FTSE EPRA Nareit Developed Europe Index to around EUR 500 bn.
Sentence: <e1>Between the strong and stable dividend yield attracting institutional investors and large and accelerating investment flows into alternative property sectors, such as healthcare and self-storage</e1>, <e2>analysts are forecasting a doubling of the FTSE EPRA Nareit Developed Europe Index to around EUR 500 bn.</e2>
